        public final boolean createPatientAccountByPatient(java.lang.String newUsername,
                                                   java.lang.String usertype,
                                                   java.lang.String newFirstName,
                                                   java.lang.String newLastName,
                                                   java.lang.String newEmail,
                                                   java.lang.String newAddress,
                                                   java.lang.String newHomePhone,
                                                   java.lang.String newCellPhone,
                                                   java.sql.Date dateOfBirth,
                                                   java.lang.String newGender,
                                                   java.lang.String contractPeriod)
        Method to create patient account by patient
        Parameters:
        newUsername - the patient username
        usertype - the patient username
        newFirstName - the patient first name
        newLastName - the patient last name
        newEmail - the patient email address
        newAddress - the patient physical address
        newHomePhone - the patient home phone
        newCellPhone - the patient cell phone
        dateOfBirth - the patient date of birth
        newGender - the patient gender
        contractPeriod - the contract period
        Returns:
        true when the account has been created

        public final boolean addNewRecord(java.lang.String activityUser,
                                  java.lang.String username,
                                  java.lang.String current,
                                  java.lang.String goal,
                                  java.lang.String start,
                                  java.lang.String lowest,
                                  java.lang.String halfway,
                                  java.lang.String lost,
                                  java.lang.String calories,
                                  java.lang.String chest,
                                  java.lang.String waist,
                                  java.lang.String abdomen,
                                  java.lang.String hip)
        Method to add new record
        Parameters:
        activityUser - the registered user name
        username - the registered user name
        current - the current weight
        goal - the goal weight
        start - the start weight
        lowest - the lowest weight
        halfway - the halfway goal
        lost - the lost weight
        calories - the calories
        chest - the chest measurement
        waist - the waist line
        abdomen - the abdomen measurement
        hip - the hip measurement
        Returns:
        true if the record is added

      • addNewJournal

        public boolean addNewJournal(java.lang.String activityUser,
                             java.lang.String username,
                             java.lang.String purpose,
                             java.lang.String current,
                             java.lang.String goal,
                             java.lang.String start,
                             java.lang.String lowest,
                             java.lang.String halfway,
                             java.lang.String lost,
                             java.lang.String calories,
                             java.lang.String chest,
                             java.lang.String waist,
                             java.lang.String abdomen,
                             java.lang.String hip)
        method to add new patient journal
        Parameters:
        activityUser - user who do the function
        username - patient username
        purpose - purpose of the that journal
        current - the current weight
        goal - the goal weight
        start - the start weight
        lowest - the lowest weight
        halfway - the halfway weight
        lost - weight lost
        calories - the calories need
        chest - chest measurement
        waist - waist measurement
        abdomen - abdomen measurement
        hip - hip measurement
        Returns:
        true if successful added, otherwise false
